LanguageData.ARA_IncubationSpeedFactor.label: Hatching speed
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationSpeedFactor.description: Indicates the hatching rate multiplier applied to the hatching pond.
LanguageData.NutrientTransmissionEfficiency.label: Biomass transfer loss
LanguageData.NutrientTransmissionEfficiency.descripti: Reduces fuel consumption when transferring biomass. Final consumption is multiplied by (1-efficiency).
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationCost.label: Nutrition required for hatching
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationCost.description: Indicates the total amount of nutrients required to hatch this weapon organ/fabric.
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationTime.label: Time required for hatching
LanguageData.ARA_IncubationTime.description: Indicates how long it takes to hatch this weapon organ/fabric.
LanguageData.ARA_IcezKillingFactor.label: Rapid cooling failure threshold
LanguageData.ARA_IcezKillingFactor.description: Indicates the percentage of HP required for a body part to be destroyed by freezing when receiving cooling damage.
